alert.note: Alert for East Turnagain Arm (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 18 at 4:12PM AKST until December 20 at 1:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TUESDAY TO 1 AM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 9 to 18 inches. Visibility as low as one half mile. Easterly winds gusting as high as 40 mph through Portage Valley. * WHERE...East Turnagain Arm. * WHEN...From 9 AM Tuesday to 1 AM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highest snow totals near Portage Valley, with lesser totals going west along Turnagain Arm. Winds will diminish late Tuesday evening, ending the threat of the half mile visibility conditions due to blowing snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
